h2_title: Yaoguai Queen Boss Fight - Kang-Jin Loong
content: However, this is just part one of her attack, as after a delay she will slam down with her tail for a massive attack -- but it can be deflected with Rock Solid.

However, this is just part one of her attack, as after a delay she will slam down with her tail for a massive attack -- but it can be deflected with Rock Solid.
